Sentence.sentence: Perhaps there is less to fight about, with the country in a period of tranquility and the dangers of drug abuse and other unwholesome behavior well known.

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps the best example of boom growth and bust decline is the Grand Banks fishery.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps in the face of impersonal and intimidating globalization, a young person's family feels more like a friendly haven than an oppressive trap.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: And the head-to-head competition might give them a strong incentive to lower their prices, perhaps by accepting slimmer profit margins or demanding better deals from providers.

Sentence.sentence: And perhaps parents are acting more like parents than in the recent past.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A surprising thing for the man who runs one of the world's most powerful economies to say? Perhaps; though in the run-up to the five-year review of the Millennium ( ' ,  千年的) Goals, he is far from alone.

Sentence.sentence: Yet the persistent question of Why do I need that? – or, perhaps more  tellingly,  Why  do  you  need  to  know  that?  –  dogs  the  steps  of  many  new  ventures.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: So what other variables could be used if the racial concept is thrown out? Yudell said scientists need to get  more specific with their language, perhaps using terms like ancestry or population that might more precisely  reflect  the  relationship  between  humans  and  their  genes,  on  both  the  individual  and  population  level.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps the reason why so many universities offer their students so little is they know studying at a top university remains a brilliant investment even if you don't learn anything.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps many teachers have too little time to allow students to form and pursue their own questions and too much ground to cover in the curriculum.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps a new phrase is needed, one that can bring everyone one big step closer to realizing Du Bois's original, idealistic hope: It's not the name—it's the Thing that counts..
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: One needs the designers, and perhaps the regulators, before the builders and operators, and each group of workers in training has to know there is work waiting beyond graduation.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Few of us wish to turn the clock back, but perhaps we need to remind ourselves how useful the right obstacles can be.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But at a time when the American factory seems to be a shrinking presence, and when good manufacturing jobs have vanished, perhaps never to return, there is something deeply troubling about this dilution of American craftsmanship.

Sentence.sentence: I never read any magazines or watch TV," he said, perhaps with a little exaggeration.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps most significant, according to Mannaz, is the increasing interest large companies have in more collaborative management models, such as those prevalent in Scandinavia, which seek to integrate the hard and soft aspects of leadership and encourage delegated responsibility and accountability.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: That is not surprising: politicians with an eye on the next election will hardly rush to introduce unpopular measures that may not bear fruit for years, perhaps decades.

Sentence.sentence: At the same time, perhaps inevitably, the humanities—while still popular in elite colleges and universities—have experienced a significant decline

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps the best examples are the five scientific papers Einstein wrote in his "miracle year" of 1905.

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps surprisingly, it is not all good news: there is a sting in the tail of the Obama effect.

Sentence.sentence: We seek it out in others and are proud to claim it in ourselves, perhaps even more than good looks or intelligence

Sentence.sentence: We can perhaps claim compensation from the steel suppliers for failure to deliver on time.

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps it is early nerve development that makes some infant girls show more intelligence than infant boys.

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps we are even a bit frightened we may get like that, so we laugh.

Sentence.sentence: The old stereotypes of men's and women's work have been changing more quickly than ever before, except perhaps in my own marriage
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps a policy to meet funeral expenses would be sufficient for the young child.

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps a Roman official wanted Pompeii-like interior to remind him of home.

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps enough insurance should be needed to cover their debts and burial expenses.

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps my expectations of lunches, water-cooler gossip and caring, deep-and-meaningful conversations were a legacy of the last time I was in that kind of office environment.

Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps we should do a practice run of the presentation first.

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps worse, the detrimental effects of an unhealthy diet and insufficient exercise are not limited to your body.

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps, if we continue to improve information-processing machines, we'll soon have helpful rational assistants.

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps, taken 31 slightly out of context, piaget's statement seems harsh.

Sentence.sentence: Research shows that when we absorb information in order to teach it to someone else, we learn it more accurately and deeply, perhaps in part because we are engaging our social cognition.

Sentence.sentence: So contrary to concerns, perhaps pasta can be part of a healthy diet.

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些副词均有"或许，大概"之意。
means: maybe ： 普通用词，美国英语多用。指某事也许如此，含不能确定意味。
perhaps ： 普通用词，多用于英国，与maybe同义。
possibly ： 指客观上潜存着发生某种变化的可能。
probably ： 一般指根据逻辑推理，估计有发生的可能，把握性较大，语气比possibly强。

stems_affixes.value_cn: 偶然的,无计划的,随意的,杂乱无章的
stems_affixes.word_buile: hap机会,运气+hazard冒险的事,游戏→运气加游戏→偶然的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 快乐的,幸福的;乐意的;令人满意的
stems_affixes.word_buile: hap机会,运气+y……的→happy有运气的→幸福的
per全部+hap机会,运气+s表复数→全部都是机会,运气[决定]
hap机会,运气+hazard冒险的事,游戏→运气加游戏→偶然的
happy[adj.快乐的,幸福的;乐意的;令人满意的]+ness性质,状态→happiness幸福,幸运
hap机会,运气+en表动词→happen机会来了→发生

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps willfully , it may be easier to think about such lengthy timescales than about the more immediate future.

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps that is why we explore the starry skies, as if answering a primal calling to know ourselves and our true ancestral homes.

means.word_mean: 或许, 大概, 可能

sentences.en: If you are good I shall perhaps take you for a walk this afternoon.
sentences.cn: 如果你乖, 我今天下午可能带你出去散散步。

sentences.en: I perhaps come across him tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我明天也许会偶然遇到他。

sentences.en: You want to make stay long in Beijing, perhaps?
sentences.cn: 你要在北京呆很长一段时间吗?

sentences.en: Perhaps I am wrong, but I think she is over 60 years old.
sentences.cn: 我也许记错了, 不过我想她已60出头了。

sentences.en: Perhaps it will rain in the afternoon.
sentences.cn: 下午可能有雨。

sentences.en: Perhaps they are in need of our help.
sentences.cn: 或许他们需要我们的帮助。

sentences.en: Perhaps I can help you.
sentences.cn: 也许我能帮帮你的忙吧。

sentences.en: Perhaps this is his finest novel yet.
sentences.cn: 这也许是至今为止他写得最好的一部小说。

sentences.en: Perhaps you would be good enough to explain this for me.
sentences.cn: 请您为我解释这个, 行吗?

sentences.en: Perhaps you would be kind enough to read this.
sentences.cn: 就请你把它念一念好吗?

sentences.en: Perhaps you would like to see it?
sentences.cn: 你可能想看这东西吧?

means.word_mean: （表示勉强同意或其实不赞成）也许，大概
（用于委婉的请求、主动承诺或提出建议）也许，如果 </seg>

sentence.cn: 但布鲁克斯结构化的他的书在一个非正统的(非常规的),或者不幸的方式。
sentence.en: But Brooks has structured his book in an unorthodox(非常规的),  and perhaps unfortunate way.
sentence.from: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 阅读理解 阅读E 原文

sentence.cn: 解决方案显而易见，尽管可能不是那么容易能做到。
sentence.en: The solution is obvious though perhaps not easy to apply.
sentence.from: 2016年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

entry.def: You use perhaps to express uncertainty, for example, when you do not know that something is definitely true, or when you are mentioning something that may possibly happen in the future in the way you describe.

example.ex: Millson regarded her thoughtfully. Perhaps she was right...
example.tran: 米尔森若有所思地注视着她。或许她是对的。

example.ex: In the end they lose millions, perhaps billions...
example.tran: 最后他们输掉几百万，或许是几十亿。

entry.def: You use perhaps in opinions and remarks to make them appear less definite or more polite.
entry.tran: （用以缓和语气或表示礼貌）也许，可能

example.ex: Perhaps the most important lesson to be learned is that you simply cannot please everyone...
example.tran: 也许最应吸取的教训就是懂得众口难调。

example.ex: His very last paintings are perhaps the most puzzling...
example.tran: 他去世前的最后一批画作也许是最让人困惑的。

entry.def: You use perhaps when you are making suggestions or giving advice. Perhaps is also used in formal English to introduce requests.
entry.tran: （用于给出建议或在正式语体中提出请求）也许，或者

example.ex: Perhaps I may be permitted a few suggestions...
example.tran: 也许我可以提几条建议。

example.ex: Well, perhaps you'll come and see us at our place?...
example.tran: 嗯，或者你到我们家来见我们如何？

entry.def: You can say perhaps as a response to a question or remark, when you do not want to agree or accept, but think that it would be rude to disagree or refuse.
entry.tran: （委婉地表示不赞同或不接受）也许，大概

example.ex: 'You know it doesn't make sense for you.' — 'Perhaps. I don't know. Maybe it does maybe it doesn't.'...
example.tran: “你知道它对你来说没有意义。”——“也许吧，我不知道。可能有意义，也可能没意义。”

example.ex: 'I'm sure we can make it,' he says. Perhaps, but it will not be easy.
example.tran: “我确信我们能成功。”他说。也许吧，但是不会轻而易举。

sentences.sentence: "we may possibly run into them at the concert"
"it may peradventure be thought that there never was such a time"

sentences.cn: “你来不来？”“也许来。要看我身体情况了。”
sentences.en: ‘Are you going to come? ’ ‘Perhaps. I'll see how I feel. ’

sentences.cn: 也许是他忘掉了。
sentences.en: Perhaps he's forgotten.

sentences.cn: 这也许是他迄今最好的小说。
sentences.en: This is perhaps his best novel to date.

sentences.cn: 一项可能影响20%的人口的改革
sentences.en: a change which could affect perhaps 20% of the population

sentences.cn: “你可以自己做。”“嗯，也许吧。”
sentences.en: ‘You could do it yourself. ’ ‘Yeah, perhaps. ’

sentences.cn: 如果你明天回来，也许更好。
sentences.en: Perhaps it would be better if you came back tomorrow.

sentences.cn: 我想今晚你已经喝得够多了。
sentences.en: I think perhaps you've had enough to drink tonight.

sentences.cn: 米尔森若有所思地注视着她。或许她是对的。
sentences.en: Millson regarded her thoughtfully. Perhaps she was right...

sentences.cn: 最后他们输掉几百万，或许是几十亿。
sentences.en: In the end they lose millions, perhaps billions...

sentences.cn: 也许最应吸取的教训就是懂得众口难调。
sentences.en: Perhaps the most important lesson to be learned is that you simply cannot please everyone...

sentences.cn: 他去世前的最后一批画作也许是最让人困惑的。
sentences.en: His very last paintings are perhaps the most puzzling...

sentences.cn: 也许我可以提几条建议。
sentences.en: Perhaps I may be permitted a few suggestions...

sentences.cn: 嗯，或者你到我们家来见我们如何？
sentences.en: Well, perhaps you'll come and see us at our place?...

sentences.cn: “你知道它对你来说没有意义。”——“也许吧，我不知道。可能有意义，也可能没意义。”
sentences.en: 'You know it doesn't make sense for you.' — 'Perhaps. I don't know. Maybe it does maybe it doesn't.'...

sentences.cn: “我确信我们能成功。”他说。也许吧，但是不会轻而易举。
sentences.en: 'I'm sure we can make it,' he says. Perhaps, but it will not be easy.

sentences.cn: 你要在北京呆很长一段时间 吗 ?
sentences.en: You want to make stay long in Beijing, perhaps?

sentences.cn: 你可能想看这东西吧?
sentences.en: Perhaps you would like to see it?

sentences.cn: 价格降到了三英镑. 如果玻璃有破损,或许他还会再降点儿.
sentences.en: The price was knocked down to ￡3. Perhaps he'll knock the price down a little if the glass is broken.

sentences.cn: 他许不来了.
sentences.en: Perhaps he isn't coming.

sentences.cn: 也许我们都只是在追逐一个幻想.
sentences.en: Perhaps we are all just chasing a mirage.

sentences.cn: 我也许无意中做了什么得罪她的事。
sentences.en: Perhaps, unconsciously, I've done something to offend her.

sentences.cn: 他经历的恐怖事件在他脑海中刻下了深深的，或许是难以磨灭的印记。
sentences.en: The horrors he experienced are imprinted, perhaps indelibly, in his brain.

sentences.cn: 米尔森若有所思地注视着她。或许她是对的。
sentences.en: Millson regarded her thoughtfully. Perhaps she was right...

sentences.cn: 最后他们输掉几百万，或许是几十亿。
sentences.en: In the end they lose millions, perhaps billions...

sentences.cn: 或许有人会执拗地认为，与思考即将到来的未来相比，思考如此之长的时间跨度似乎更为容易。
sentences.en: Perhaps willfully, it may be easier to think about such lengthy timescales than about the more immediate future.

sentences.cn: 现如今潜在的技术进步，以及它所带来的社会影响，复杂地难以形容，或许最好的办法是把我们所能想象到的诸多可能性留给科幻小说家和未来学家们去探索。
sentences.en: The potential evolution of today’s technology, and is social consequences, is dazzlingly complicated, and it’s perhaps best left to science fiction writers and futurologists to explore the many possibilities we can envisage.

sentences.cn: 或许，正如研究小组所言，是嗅觉基因把我们吸引到了类似的环境之中。但事情并没有那么简单。
sentences.en: Perhaps,as the team suggests, it draws us to similar environments but there is more to it.

sentences.cn: 或许这就是我们要探索星空的原因,就好像是在回应一个原始召唤，即了解我们自己和我们的祖先的真正家园。
sentences.en: Perhaps that is why we explore the starry skies, as if answering a primal calling to know ourselves and our true ancestral homes.

sentences.cn: 或许这解释了为什么许多人担忧无工作的未来会满是痛苦沉闷。
sentences.en: Perhaps this is why many worry about the agonizing dullness of a jobless future.

sentences.cn: 所以记住你遇见过和与之交谈过的人身上的小细节吧，或许是他们去过的地方，他们想去的地方，他们喜欢的事物，他们讨厌的事物，任何你们谈到的东西都可以
sentences.en: So remember the little details of the people you met or you talked with; perhaps the places they have been to the place they want to go, the things they like, the thing the hate—whatever you talk about

sentences.cn: 或许需要一个新的词语，一个可以带领大家实现 Du Bois 的原创理想主义愿景：“名字并不重要，重要的是这件事。”
sentences.en: Perhaps a new phrase is needed, one that can bring everyone one big step closer to realizing Du Bois ’ s original, idealistic hope:  “ It ’ s not the name  — it ’ s the Thing that counts. ”
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 或许促进经济繁荣、抵御衰退的最好范例就是大浅滩渔场。
sentences.en: Perhaps the best example of boom growth and bust decline is the Grand Banks fishery.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: and their genes, on both the individual and population level.Yudell 表示，科学家应该使他们的语言更明确，或许用“世系”或者“种群”这样的词能更准确地从个体和群体的层面反映人类和基因的关系。
sentences.en: Yudell said scientists  need to get more specific with their language, perhaps using terms like “ancestry”or “population” that might more precisely reflect the relationship betwen humans
sentences.from: 16年12月六级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 然而，“我为什么需要它？”——或许更有力的问法是：“你为什么要知道这些？”——这个问题长期存在，阻碍了许多新的风险投资项目的推进。
sentences.en: Yet  the  persistent  question  of “Why  do I need that?”– or, perhaps more tellingly, “Why do you need to know that?”– dogs the steps of many new ventures.
sentences.from: 16年12月六级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 或许我们可以向日本学习，日本有自己的一套私立大学和公立大学的系统。
sentences.en: Perhaps we can learn from Japan where they have a system of private and public universities.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 如果他们知道我们的情况，或许就不会如此友善了。
sentences.en: Maybe  if  they did know what we did, perhaps they wouldn’t be so friendly.
sentences.from: 16年12月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 好好享受现在的雪天吧，因为2014 年很有(29) 可能将会更热，或许会成为有记录以来最热的一年。
sentences.en: Enjoy the snow now, because 29 chances are good that 2014 will be even hotter, perhaps the hottest year since records have been kept.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 或许，让人们重回厨房亲自下厨也并非遥不可及。
sentences.en: Perhaps a return to real cooking needn’t be far off.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 好吧，呃，或许我明天会再打电话过来。
sentences.en: Well, perhaps I’ll ring back tomorrow.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 每场谈判或许都分为六个阶段。
sentences.en: There are perhaps six stages in every negotiation
sentences.from: 17年12月四级真题(第二套)| 听力

sentences.cn: 我的水晶球说或许你正计划抢劫奥戴尔博物馆, 是?
sentences.en: My crystal ball said that perhaps you are planning to rob the museum in Auldale, yes?

sentences.cn: 总的来说, 它是令人愉快的, 或许不如此如一些其他喜剧.
sentences.en: Overall, it is enjoy able, but perhaps not much so as some of the other comedies.

sentences.cn: 或许我是想使他对我早熟的智慧加深印象.
sentences.en: Perhaps I was trying to impress him with my precocious wisdom.

sentences.cn: 一个重要的人 —— 或许是你的父母或老师 —— 生你气了.
sentences.en: An important person, a parent or teacher perhaps, was angry with you.

sentences.cn: 人们必须首先具备提出哲学基本问题的精神准备 ( 或许还有感情上的 ).
sentences.en: One must have first the mental ( and perhaps, emotional ) wherewithal to ask the fundamental question.

sentences.cn: 这些无奈或许是因为主观原因造成的, 也或许是因为客观条件所限产生的.
sentences.en: But perhaps because of these subjective causes, also perhaps because the objective conditions created.

sentences.cn: 或许这路在水中、于陆上,处处都有.
sentences.en: Perhaps it is everywhere on water and on land.

sentences.cn: 在短期的通胀上升之后,可能是另一场衰退, 另一场银行业危机, 又或许是通缩.
sentences.en: A short inflationary boom could be followed by another recession, another banking crisis, and perhaps deflation.

sentences.cn: 或许真是这么一回事, 也许这是他们的兴趣所至.
sentences.en: Perhaps It'seems so , but they are probably just having a good time.

sentences.cn: 或许这两种想象中都有一定的真实成分, 但是我们中很少有人有机会去发现它.
sentences.en: Perhaps there is an element of truth in both these pictures, but few of us have had the opportunity to find out.

sentences.cn: “你来不来？”“也许来。要看我身体情况了。”
sentences.en: ‘Are you going to come? ’ ‘Perhaps. I'll see how I feel. ’

sentences.cn: 也许是他忘掉了。
sentences.en: Perhaps he's forgotten.

sentences.cn: 这也许是他迄今最好的小说。
sentences.en: This is perhaps his best novel to date.

sentences.cn: “你可以自己做。”“嗯，也许吧。”
sentences.en: ‘You could do it yourself. ’ ‘Yeah, perhaps. ’

sentences.cn: 如果你明天回来，也许更好。
sentences.en: Perhaps it would be better if you came back tomorrow.

sentences.cn: 也许最应吸取的教训就是懂得众口难调。
sentences.en: Perhaps the most important lesson to be learned is that you simply cannot please everyone...

sentences.cn: 他去世前的最后一批画作也许是最让人困惑的。
sentences.en: His very last paintings are perhaps the most puzzling...

sentences.cn: 也许我可以提几条建议。
sentences.en: Perhaps I may be permitted a few suggestions...

sentences.cn: “你知道它对你来说没有意义。”——“也许吧，我不知道。可能有意义，也可能没意义。”
sentences.en: 'You know it doesn't make sense for you.' — 'Perhaps. I don't know. Maybe it does maybe it doesn't.'...

sentences.cn: “我确信我们能成功。”他说。也许吧，但是不会轻而易举。
sentences.en: 'I'm sure we can make it,' he says. Perhaps, but it will not be easy.

sentences.cn: 在当今世界,高薪聘请的高管们不应该对他们运营的机构所发生的事情负责已经成为常态，也许我们也不应该如此惊讶。
sentences.en: In today’s world, it has become normal that well—paid executives should not be accountable for what happens in the organizations that they run. Perhaps we should not be so surprised.

sentences.cn: 在有限的几个方面，也许大萧条将使得整个社会变得更好。
sentences.en: In limited respects, perhaps the recession will leave society better off.

sentences.cn: 但是也许最重要的原因是，这个问题一直受到严重政治制约。
sentences.en: But perhaps the most significant reason is that theissue has always been so politically charged.

sentences.cn: 排固定时间阅读，这也许出人意料。
sentences.en: Perhaps surprisingly, scheduling regular times for reading.

sentences.cn: 能源转变的速度似乎也在持续加快——也许这正好能有效地减缓气候变化的速度。
sentences.en: The pace of change in energy sources appears to be speeding up – perhaps just in time to have a meaningful effect in slowing climate change.

sentences.cn: 也许， (31) 稍微脱离语境来看，Piaget 的说法似乎有些刺耳。
sentences.en: Perhaps, taken 31 slightly out of context, Piaget’s statement seems harsh.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 因此，如果你是一名总是边喝黑咖啡边复习的学生，那么也许在考前给自己准备一杯黑咖啡是明智之举。
sentences.en: So if you are a student who always reviews over black coffee, perhaps it would be sensible to prime yourself with a cup before the exam.

sentences.cn: 男：是的，员工在公司里的职位越高就越快乐，这也许并不令人意外。
sentences.en: M: Yes, perhaps not surprisingly, the higher people go in a company, the happier they are.
sentences.from: 17年6月六级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 但也许普鲁塔克想表达的是别的意思，可能和马库斯 · 西塞罗的说法比较相近，即“批评是创造，不是挑毛病”。
sentences.en: But perhaps Plutarch is suggesting something slightly different, something a bit closer to Marcus Cicero ’ s claim that one should  “ criticize by creation, not by finding fault. ”
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 也许写就完美短文的关键并不是要放弃，而是永远不要欣然收笔。
sentences.en: Perhaps the point of writing the flawless essay was not to give up, but to never willingly finish.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 但他们也许没必要让自己变成私家侦探或者国会小组委员会。
sentences.en: But perhaps they don’t have to turn themselves into private investigators or Congressional subcommittees.
sentences.from: 16年6月四级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 俗话说, 沧海横流, 方显英雄本色.
sentences.en: As the saying goes, chaos , heroes demonstrate their nature.

sentences.cn: 在他们到来以前,也许我们可以把情况弄弄清楚.
sentences.en: Perhaps we can be sure of the facts before they arrive.

sentences.cn: 也许明明知道自己错了, 但是还是有那么点侥幸心里在作怪.
sentences.en: Perhaps knowing that she had been wrong, but still get lucky are so mind at play.

sentences.cn: 也许只有在这个时候, 在刘星的眼里她才是美丽的.
sentences.en: Perhaps only at this time, in the eyes of Liu Xing, she is beautiful.

sentences.cn: 这也许是至今为止他写得最好的一部小说.
sentences.en: Perhaps this is his finest novel yet.

sentences.cn: 也许是他以为她年纪太小了吧.
sentences.en: Perhaps he thought her too young.

sentences.cn: 这全是假定.
sentences.en: These are all perhapses.

sentences.cn: 我猜想我们都只是更加小心开车,那时也许知道我们的限度.
sentences.en: I guess that we all just drove more carefully back then and perhaps knew our limits.
